description:
Tina is going to buy a nice swimsuit and all the girls accompany her. Back home, Taeko receives a letter from her grandma who invites her to the beach house she runs, so they all decide to join her on the trip.
When playing on the beach, Taeko seems a bit lonely but Kaoru asks her and her cousin Chika to play frisbee with him. Aoi is too shy to expose her skin in public and just watches from afar, although Miyabi asks her whether this is alright.
